00025 // for ease in passing sets of file info between functions
00026 typedef struct {
00027         char *N; // the name of the file -- use strdup to allocate/copy
00028         FILE *F; // the file pointer
00029 } fileset;
00030 // similar to the perl notion of "slurping" a file
00031 typedef struct {
00032         int n; // number of lines
00033         char **L; // each line
00034 } fileslurp;
